Tarka Indian Kitchen

Tarka Indian Kitchen is an Austin-based restaurant, serving fresh and flavorful Indian food that is also fast and affordable. The word tarka is defined as the explosion of the senses that happens when whole spices and fresh ingredients like garlic, ginger and onions meet a hot pan.
